mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (bno, writer , content , ip_address,state,password) VALUES (#{bno},#{writer},#{content},#{ip_address},#{state},#{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply A SET A.content = #{content}, A.ip_address = #{ip_address}, A.updateDate = NOW(), A.state = 'UPDATED' WHERE A.rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM tbl_reply A WHERE A.rno = #{rno}
SELECT A.* FROM tbl_reply A WHERE A.bno = #{bno}
SELECT A.* FROM tbl_reply A WHERE 1=1
SELECT HIS.* FROM tbl_reply_history HIS WHERE HIS.rno = #{rno}
